Product Id: Atlantic includes Newfoundland and Labrador, Prince Edward Island, Nova Scotia and New Brunswick.
Territories include Yukon, Northwest Territories and Nunavut.

Transportation and warehousing only includes air transportation, rail transportation, water transportation, truck transportation, pipeline transportation, scenic and sightseeing transportation, support activities for transportation, couriers and messengers and wharehousing and storage.

Health care and social assistance only includes office of physicians, office of dentists, office of other health practitioners, out-patient care centres, home health care services, nursing and residential care facilities and child day-care services, and excludes organizations controlled by federal, provincial, and local government according to the Canadian Classification of Institutional Units and Sectors.
Construction only includes construction of buildings.
Ambulatory health care services only includes office of physicians, office of dentists, office of other health practitioners, out-patient care centres and home health care services.
Social assistance only includes child day-care services.
